flawed_nl_solution:
When Jerry reads 30 pages on Saturday, he would be remaining with 93-30 = <<93-30=61>>61 pages.
After reading an additional 20 pages on Sunday, he would be remaining with 61 - 20 = <<61-20=41>>41 pages.
#### 41

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 63, not 61. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
